titles.title: A joint resolution to designate March 17, 1988, as "National China-Burma-India Veterans Association Day".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 5/13/1987--Introduced. Designates March 17, 1988, as National China-Burma-India Veterans Association Day.
